price: 75 qui ne leur seront jamais allégés mais qui, au contraire, les feront sombrer dans un profond désespoir.
arabic: لَا يُفَتَّرُ عَنۡهُمۡ وَهُمۡ فِيهِ مُبۡلِسُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: lā yufattaru ʿanhum wahum fīhi mub'lisūna
